scripts.start: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed && npx nodemon index.js
scripts.db:migrate: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:clean: docker exec docker_api_1 node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && docker exec docker_api_1 node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate && docker exec docker_api_1 node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all
